parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Vectors
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts vector direction from world to model space in [[Simulation vs Render Time Scope|render time scope]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[vectorWorldToModelVisual]] worldDir

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> worldDir: [[Array]] - vector direction in world space in format [x,y,z]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - vector direction in model space in format [x,y,z]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Convert world space vector [0,-10,4] to model space of object _airplane:
<code>_airplane [[vectorWorldToModelVisual]] [0,-10,4];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addForce]], [[worldToModelVisual]], [[addTorque]], [[vectorModelToWorld]], [[vectorModelToWorldVisual]], [[vectorWorldToModel]]
</value></part></template></root>
